snippet: Even with Atlanta’s addition of the rookie Julio Jones at receiver, Michael Turner carried the ball 301 times this season, second among N.F.L. running backs.
abstract: Atlanta Falcons running back Michael Turner has carried the ball 301 times this season, second among NFL running backs, even after the team added rookie receiver Julio Jones, which many observers believed would lead to greater focus on passing.
lead_paragraph: Even with Atlanta’s addition of the rookie Julio Jones at receiver, Michael Turner carried the ball 301 times this season, second among N.F.L. running backs.

headline.seo: Michael Turner, Falcons Back, Still Shoulders Load
headline.main: For a Team Called Soft, Falcons Run With Ferocity
headline.print_headline: For a Team Called Soft, Falcons Run With Ferocity
